activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-server#11304
activity.text:
@stephanegigandet Here's one:

https://world.openfoodfacts.org/product/6416453015432/milk-chocolate-dumle-fazer

- Old revision works fine: https://world.openfoodfacts.org/product/6416453015432/milk-chocolate-dumle-fazer?rev=21
- Current is busted: https://world.openfoodfacts.org/product/6416453015432/milk-chocolate-dumle-fazer?rev=22

On the edit screen it looks fine right now, I bet editing it would unbreak it but I'll let you try and reproduce the error first.
